meanings.definition: Small or insignificant in size or importance
meanings.sent1: The toy car looked dinkier next to the real one.
meanings.sent2: The kitten was dinkier than the adult cat.
meanings.sent3: The dinkier cupcake was too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her dinkier voice was barely audible over the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The dinkier star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.definition: Comparatively small or inferior in size or quality
meanings.sent1: The dinkier house on the street had a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: His dinkier phone couldn't run the latest apps.
meanings.sent3: The dinkier umbrella flipped inside out in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The dinkier boat struggled to keep up with the larger ones.
meanings.sent5: The dinkier flower in the garden bloomed brightly.
